description:
Excellent for the loose, muddy conditions of aggressive all-mountain riding. With the side knobs of the legendary Minion DHF, but extra wider for support, it corners like no other tire out there. Pair it with a Minion DHF up front for the ultimate aggressive trail riding tire setup!

  • 3C Maxx Terra soft compound offers traction, good tread wear, and less rolling resistance than Maxx Grip
  • Centre tread has ramped knobs to improve acceleration and sipes for smooth transitions when leaning
  • Paddle-like knobs on the centre tread dig in under hard braking and add control
  • EXO+ protection reduces the chances of punctures and sidewall cutting
  • Wide trail spacing is optimized for 35mm inner width rims
  • Tubeless-ready
name: Maxxis Minion DHR2 29in. TR 3C Maxx Terra EXO+ Folding Tire
